content: The Privileges of Citizenship in Zion.
A Psalm of the sons of Korah. A Song.
The  loves the gates of Zion
More than all the  dwelling places of Jacob.
Glorious things are spoken of you,
“I shall mention Rahab and Babylon among those who know Me;
Behold, Philistia and Tyre with Cush:
But of Zion it will be said, “This one and that one were born in her”;
And the Most High Himself will establish her.
The  will count when He registers the peoples,
Then those who sing as  those who play the flutes ,
